proyects.title: ShortLink
proyects.content: Web application designed to simplify and customize long URLs, turning them into short, easy-to-share links. This platform also includes user authentication and link management, allowing users to manage their shortened URLs easily and securely.

proyects.title: Hackthon Cloudinary
proyects.content: I developed a Halloween-themed project focused on adding or removing elements from users' images. I demonstrated skills in creativity, problem-solving

proyects.title: Ecommerce Admin
proyects.content: It facilitates the management of online stores, allowing you to manage products, categories and orders efficiently. Built with Next.js, Prisma and Shadcn, it offers a control panel optimized for productivity, accompanied by a minimalist design thanks to Tailwind CSS.

proyects.title: Ecommerce Store
proyects.content: Offers a complete online shopping experience, with Stripe integration for secure payments. Built with the above Admin eCommerce API, its fluid and modern interface ensures a streamlined user experience, while the shopping cart and checkout flow are intuitive and functional.

proyects.title: API MVC
proyects.content: Backend solution that follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture pattern. It allows CRUD operations to be performed on a movie database, offering a robust service deployed on Railway.

proyects.title: Shopping Cart
proyects.content: Allows users to add and manage products in a shopping cart, providing an interactive and agile experience. The application efficiently manages the status of the cart, functional for any device.
